summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the issuance and sale of serial consolidated local improvement district bonds in the principal amount of $898,256.54 for the purpose of funding outstanding local improvement district obligations of The City of Seattle; fixing the form, date, covenants, maturities and denominations of such bonds; establishing Consolidated Local Improvement District No. 3 and "Consolidated Local Improvement District No. 3 Bond Redemption Fund."
